title: Need: annotate on the remote that some subdatasets are not publicly available
body:
I am using datalad 0.13.6 on Ubuntu 18.04.5 machine.

I am seeing the following error message when I try to `datalad install` under `datasets.datalad.org/centerforopenneuroscience` repo.

```
brlife@wrangler2:/mnt/datalad/datasets.datalad.org/centerforopenneuroscience$ git remote -v
origin	http://datasets.datalad.org/centerforopenneuroscience/.git (fetch)
origin	http://datasets.datalad.org/centerforopenneuroscience/.git (push)
```

```
brlife@wrangler2:/mnt/datalad/datasets.datalad.org/centerforopenneuroscience$ datalad install -r .
```
